price: 3. Op de dag der opstanding zullen jullie noch van jullie kinderen noch van jullie verwanten profiteren. Hij zal tussen jullie oordelen. En Allah is de Alziende van wat jullie doen.
arabic: لَن تَنفَعَكُمۡ أَرۡحَامُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡۚ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
category: She that is to be Examined

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lan tanfaʿakum arḥāmukum walā awlādukum yawma al-qiyāmati yafṣilu baynakum wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
